DOC.criteria: Age range 1830 year old Visual acuity 20/20 well Refractive error > ±6.00 DS and/or ± 2.00 DC History presence ocular disease Family history diabetes glaucoma History intraocular refractive surgery Nursing pregnant woman History clinically diagnose endocrine disease History vascular disease , cardiovascular disease , treat respiratory disorder ( seasonal asthma exclude long subject take Rx time ) History systemic hypertension Habitual smoking Use medication affect blood flow
